scripts.start: concurrently "cd AppServe && npm start" "cd AppTools && npm start"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd AppServe && npm run dev" "cd AppTools && npm run dev"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd AppServe && npm install && cd ../AppTools && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && cd AppServe && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../AppTools && rm -rf node_modules
